reviewText: Pretty good bio of Chopin, but again, some of these need more info. All in all it is better than some. I am looking for indepth info abot the composer.

This is a brief biography of Chopin's life.  The film goes to the different homes and cities that he lived in.  You also get to hear his music, see pianos he played and see letters and music that he wrote.  I found it very interesting.
Very nice!  Loved the price, loved the service.
this is another fast moving dvd full of imformation that piano students will love. its a better review of his life than any movie
